changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `log` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `script_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `level` varchar(64) COLLATE utf8_polish_ci NOT NULL, `message` varchar(1024) COLLATE utf8_polish_ci NOT NULL, `thread_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `thread_name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_polish_ci NOT NULL, `uuid` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_polish_ci NOT NULL, `timestamp` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `log_script_fkey` (`script_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_polish_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=1221 ;
ALTER TABLE `log` ADD CONSTRAINT `log_script_fkey` FOREIGN KEY (`script_id`) REFERENCES `script` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION;
